title: MD
biography: Tomáš Zima is a Czech physician, chemist, and a teaching professor in the fields of biochemistry, clinical chemistry and laboratory medicine. He was the Rector of Charles University in Prague, Czech Republic between 2014 - 2022 and was a candidate in the 2023 Czech presidential election.
aiSummary: Tomáš Zima is a clinical biochemistry specialist with an H-index of 47 at Charles University (Member). Has been published in Journal of Biomedical Science, Critical Reviews in Clinical Laboratory Sciences, Cells Tissues Organs. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
